short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dashboard for saving timestamps and customizing viewing while learning dances on Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For anyone who has tried to learn dances through Youtube, you probably know the pain of having to walk over to your computer, find the correct start point, and do it all over again when you want to practice a sequence again. DanceDash is a little dashboard that allows you to save timestamps of videos for quick access and also customize viewing with loops, different playback speeds, and start and end times. Let's all become dope dancers!
